A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was great. My theories I had came up with didn't end up following all the way through but I am happy with the end result. I think the overwhelmingly lukewarm audience score is from over-hype. The movie has  been hyped for 2 years now. 2 years of theorizing and guessing and hype-building. Yes the movie has some flaws\, but what movie doesn't. It was a good movie and\, at least to me\, a good Star Wars movie.
